ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for Captain Seat Type)

atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the parts may injure your hands.

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the RH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE INNER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the rearmost position.
Detach the 2 claws and remove the inner seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE OUTER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Using a clip remover, remove the clip.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the clip remover tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Detach the claw and remove the outer seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR INNER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the foremost position.
Detach the claw and remove the rear inner seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR OUTER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Detach the 3 claws and remove the rear outer seat track bracket cover RH.
Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the rearmost position.

Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the rear No. 1 seat assembly to the center position. Also, operate the reclining adjuster release handle RH and move the rear No. 1 seatback to the upright position.
Remove the rear No. 1 seat assembly from the vehicle.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.
